Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Throughout the morning of Wednesday 27th May, our Secondary Student Council will be selling Summer Fair Raffle tickets. Proceeds from the sales of the tickets will go to a number of causes and charities including Nepal - Dhading Schools, Bungamati DSA School, Pasupathi School and the Disabled New Life Sentre.
Details are as follows:
Summer Fair 2015 Raffle Tickets
RM5 per ticket Buy 5 tickets for RM20 1 booklet = 100 tickets, buy 1 booklet and get 5 more tickets free
Exciting prizes to be won include:
Samsung S6 Phone iPad Mini Flights to Bali Vouchers for High Tea at One World Hotel 2 Days/1 Night stay at The Royale Chulan Hotel Travel voucher worth RM1000 Vouchers for Health Screening Ice Skating Vouchers DVD Stereo Set XFactory Vouchers Fitness Memberships Electrical and home appliances (rice cookers, ovens, blenders, deep fryer, home fragrances)
Your child is welcome to bring cash in tomorrow to support these good causes.
Looking forward to all your support.
Kind regards, Admin Team British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
